extension.name: Entry Versions
extension.description: Super-easy version history of your entry content.

releases.release: + Fix: Call of `Administration::instance()->Author()->getFullName()` when saving entries was switching `Symphony::Engine()` to `Administration`, which in turn lead to a clash with `email_template_manager` when saving entries with versions from the frontend and sending notification emails.
+ Commented out line `$context['messages'][] = array('version', 'passed', $version);` in extension.driver.php to get rid of frontend update error.
